directions: In a large bowl, stir together apples and lime juice. Stir in jalapeno and Anaheim chile slices. Stir in onion, cilantro, walnuts, ginger, and salt. Mix thoroughly.
ingredients: 1  fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and sliced
1  fresh Anaheim chile, seeded and sliced
½ cup chopped walnuts, lightly toasted
2 tablespoons fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced
title: Fresh Apple Salsa
